thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 23 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Tianyuan Dic Information Technology sees FY 2017 net profit up 30.5 pct to 43.6 pct

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shenzhen Tianyuan Dic Information Technology sees FY 2017 net profit up 30.5 pct to 43.6 pct

organizations.name: shenzhen tianyuan dic information technology co ltd

text:
Jan 23 (Reuters) - Shenzhen Tianyuan Dic Information Technology Co Ltd
* Says it sees net profit for FY 2017 to increase by 30.5 percent to 43.6 percent, or to be 150 million yuan to 165 million yuan
* Says the net profit of FY 2016 was 114.9 million yuan
* Comments that increased big data business income and merger of unit as main reasons for the forecast
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/6w7AQz
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
